summary: Implemented a date-only, timezone-safe age calculation utility and wired age computation into the Resident Dashboard page (based on imports and file summaries). Also introduced/modified meta/project tracking files not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified project tracking metadata (project_state.json) unrelated to displaying age on the Resident Dashboard.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for frontend UI age display and timezone-safe calculation; it did not request adding/updating project state metadata.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated a generated frontend file summary artifact.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; appears to be documentation/analysis output rather than product functionality.
